mapper.update: update student set stuSemester = #{stuSemester}, stuClass = #{stuClass}, transferStudent = #{transferStudent}, volunteerExemption = #{volunteerExemption}, departmentId = #{departmentId}, howToGraduate = #{howToGraduate} where userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: select * from student where userId like #{userId};
select s.userId, u.userName, u.phone , d.name from student s left join user u on u.id=s.userId left join department d on s.departmentId=d.id order by userId+0;
select s.userId, u.userName, u.phone , d.name from student s left join user u on u.id=s.userId left join department d on s.departmentId=d.id where s.userId like #{userId};
select s.userId, u.userName, u.phone , d.name from student s left join user u on u.id=s.userId left join department d on s.departmentId=d.id where u.userName like #{userName};
select s.*, u.*,d.*, m.* from student s left join user u on u.id=s.userId left join department d on s.departmentId=d.id left join secondMajor m on s.userId = m.userId where s.userId like #{userId};

select s.*,p.userId pId,d.name from student s join professor p on s.departmentId = p.departmentId join department d on s.departmentId = d.id where s.departmentId = p.departmentId and s.userId = #{userId}

select s.userId, u.userName, u.phone , d.name,s.stuSemester from student s left join user u on u.id=s.userId left join department d on s.departmentId=d.id where s.stuSemester in(#{semester1}, #{semester2});

select student.*, u.* from (select s.*, sum(m.credit) 'totalCredit' from student s join mySubject m on s.userId = m.userId where s.stuSemester >= 8 group by m.userId) student join user u on student.userId = u.id where totalCredit >= 130 and student.departmentId = '12' #{searchBy}
